Package org.omancode.util.swing

Generic Swing functionality.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MRUFiles.Processor Supplier of a function to execute on afile when its menu item is selected.
 

Class Summary
ArrayTableModel Display an array of any type as a table with each values' index.
DoubleCellRenderer Display doubles to a specified digit precision.
JTableExcelStyleEdit JTable that provides Excel style editing of cells.
LazyMutableTreeNode A DefaultMutableTreeNode that lazily creates children when they are needed.
MRUActionMenu A JMenu based on an MRUSet that refreshes itself when the MRUSet changes.
MRUFiles Provide a menu of MRU files and loading/saving the file list from Preferences.
PrefsOrOpenFileChooser A Swing file chooser that checks the preferences before prompting the user to select a file.
PrefsOrSaveFileChooser A Swing file chooser that checks the preferences before prompting the user to save a file.
SwingUtil Static utility class of general purpose file functions.
 

Package org.omancode.util.swing Description

Generic Swing functionality.

Author:
Oliver Mannion
